availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Yancy Oakley (Hopkins/ Webster County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah Oakley. Father of Lockey E. Oakley, Granville Oakley, and Judy L. Oakley. Married to Elizabeth Oakley. Father of Ellison Oakley and Reacy Oakley. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 157A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 623.
